short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The dScribe browser extension increases your report adoption by facilitating the automatic documentation of your reports.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
dScribe is the easiest way to embed documentation directly inside all of your browser-based systems.
 
80+ companies are already relying on dScribe to speed up user onboarding and increase adoption & understanding of their systems. Typical use cases include reports, ERP systems, CRM and custom-built applications.
 
Try it yourself - dScribe is free to use up to 10 users.
 
dScribe supports popular platforms like Microsoft Power BI, Tableau, SAP S/4HANA, Microsoft Dynamics365â€¦
 
** Getting started **
After activating the extension, pin the extension on your browser's toolbar. Click on the icon to open the interface and get started. If prompted, give the necessary permissions for the plugin to operate.
 
** Need some help? **
Don't hesitate to reach out via support@dscribedata.com or book an onboarding workshop via https://www.dscribedata.com/start-for-free
